ssl::context_service::use_tmp_dh_file

Use the specified file to obtain the temporary Diffie-Hellman parameters. 

boost::system::error_code use_tmp_dh_file(
    impl_type & impl,
    const std::string & filename,
    boost::system::error_code & ec);
